should i give up music i wonder...?

so i've been doing alot of thinking lately, but its a good thing, good thinking. -i've been having a lot of internal conflicts...i mean like i think i'm ready to get over him and move on-but then on the other hand the other half of me wanted to hold on for dear life! but he's my best friend and i love him with allll my heart so being his best friend..the best thing to do is realize the good in all the situations. And i think i'm finally able to do that. i can finally be happy for him. i mean come on, look at him-he is finally soo happy with someone who treats him right. he's got a job, he's doing the school thing. he's just in a really good place in his life right now. and i can say that i am just soo happy for him! really i am! and quite proud of how successful he's been with school and stuff. i wish i could say the same for myself.. i only ever want the best for him..

i love him with ALL my heart! he holds a wicked special place in my heart! and when someone is that special to you why wouldn't you want the best for them right?

but here's where the internal conflict comes in...theres still that nagging part of me that says stop! dont! you cant be happy for him! get him back! get him back! i still want to be with him sooo badly! i am still sooo in love with him! he was the best partner i've ever had and now i've lost him.  :-(   i wasnt ready to lose him. nevermind the fact that i really need to show him how much i love him and care for him!   -i mean i never treated him very well in the past for one thing. and if i could be with him again i would treat him like my king-cuz thats what he is to me-my king...my romeo!

but it seems all in vain to pine over him when he's at a very good place in his life right now right? i mean jeesh why would anyone give up comfort-a good thing-to take a risk on something that was bad in the past that you're not sure what will happen this time? you know? so in my thinking process i've come to realize that the best thing for everyone is that i just be happy for him and let that be that. cuz I AM happy for him. i am. i'm actually happy that he is happy! i'm sooo glad to see him happy cuz he's had a lot of hard times in his life before and now seems to be his time. so i dont wanna fuck with that ya know? by being all love me date me blah blah i'm annoying type deal...

another thing is he doesnt want me back unless i get "help". well that whole "help" thing prolly wont happen for a very long time and the process alone takes looong too-and he's already happy with someone. so again, i think theres no point if he's not going to even consider me ya know/. i'll just be making myself more crazy for no reason. so why not just start trying to move on? it'd make everyone happy....

i just wish i didnt have the internal conflicts going on between let him go and dont let him go...but i guess thats how moving on starts huh? i mean i guess its like they say...[or so i hope it is] if you love something set it free, if it returns back to you it was meant to be/or it is yours or whatever...and if it doesnt then its not yours or whatever...so i guess i just gotta do that even tho it hurts a lot to do so...but i love him! and i just want the best for him...but so yeah i think i'm ready for this...

i think now whats best is for me to work on being as good a best friend for him as i possibly can...and i'm gonna have to try really hard seeing as how we live so far apart...there's not too much i can do but i'm gonna try my damndest!...it will prolly be a very long time till we see each other again  :-(   so i have awhile to get myself better and in check and what not...then maybe we can all live happily ever after-the way the path of life has planned for us...whatever that may be-who knows....we'll see tho....
